data.message: Hi Facebook. I need ur help for change fb  page name and url link- please guide me how?

replies.message: Hi Wafa. Thanks for your question. You can change your Page's name by following these easy steps from our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/271607792873806.Keep in mind that changing your Page's name will not affect its username. To change the Page's username, you can also consult our Help Center here: https://www.facebook.com/help/203523569682738. Keep in mind that if you or another admin has already changed your Page's username, you won't be able to change it again. Hope this helps! -Hailey
i don't found anything there link. Facebook plz help me how
Facebook Thanks for reply but im unhelpful by your link. plz help me how to change my page name or avale to change my page neme!
